adPolicy.description: Expert implementation of Group Policy Objects (GPO) and Active Directory policies to enforce security standards, control user permissions, and maintain compliance across your Windows environment.

cyberSecurity.title: Cyber Security Real-Time Monitoring Solutions
cyberSecurity.description: Advanced security monitoring using OSQuery and centralized threat security platforms. Detect, analyze, and respond to security threats in real-time across your entire desktop fleet.

socNoc.title: Internal NOC or SOC Creation Consulting
socNoc.description: Build your own Network Operations Center (NOC) or Security Operations Center (SOC). We provide consulting, architecture design, tool selection, and training to establish effective security and operations teams.

nocSetup.title: NOC Setup
nocSetup.description: Infrastructure monitoring, alerting, and incident management

socSetup.title: SOC Setup
socSetup.description: Security monitoring, threat detection, and response

teamTraining.title: Team Training
teamTraining.description: Analyst training and skill development programs

offlineVMs.title: Offline VMs RMM Agents
offlineVMs.description: Specialized RMM agents designed for virtual machines and systems with intermittent or limited connectivity. Maintain visibility and control even when endpoints are offline or in air-gapped environments.

queueBased.title: Queue-Based Communication
queueBased.description: Store and forward data when connectivity is restored

localData.title: Local Data Collection
localData.description: Continuous monitoring even without network access

airGapped.title: Air-Gapped Support
airGapped.description: Manual data transfer for isolated systems

vmLifecycle.title: VM Lifecycle Tracking
vmLifecycle.description: Monitor snapshot, clone, and migration events

bandwidth.title: Bandwidth Optimization
bandwidth.description: Efficient data transmission for limited connections

thinClients.title: Thin Clients with Custom Linux/KDE Operating Systems
thinClients.description: Deploy thin client solutions with custom Linux-based operating systems featuring KDE desktop environments. Fully remotely managed, lightweight, and optimized for your specific use cases with centralized control.

customOS.title: Custom OS Development
customOS.description: Tailored Linux distributions with KDE Plasma

linuxEnterprise.title: Linux-Powered Enterprise Laptop & Workstation Fleets
linuxEnterprise.description: Enterprise-grade Linux systems for web developers and AI workloads. Customized operating systems that meet compliance requirements while providing developers with powerful tools for modern development and local AI model execution.

developer.title: Developer Workstations
developer.ides: Modern IDEs and toolchains (VS Code, Docker, etc.)
developer.git: Secure Git and SSH key management

ai.title: AI/ML Workloads
ai.cuda: CUDA and ROCm GPU driver optimization
ai.llm: Local LLM and AI model execution

centralizedRemote.title: Centralized, In-House Remote Control to Prevent Data Loss
centralizedRemote.description: Deploy on-premises remote control solutions that keep all data within your infrastructure. Prevent data loss through centralized session recording, file transfer monitoring, and access auditing without relying on third-party cloud services.

sessionRecording.title: Session Recording
sessionRecording.description: Full audit trail of remote sessions

compliance.title: Compliance Ready
compliance.description: Meets regulatory requirements for data sovereignty

dlp.title: Data Leak Prevention Solutions
dlp.description: Comprehensive data loss prevention (DLP) solutions using both open-source and custom-developed software. Detect, monitor, and prevent unauthorized data exfiltration across endpoints, network, and cloud applications.

contentInspection.title: Content Inspection
contentInspection.piiPhiPci: PII, PHI, and PCI data detection

preventionResponse.title: Prevention & Response
preventionResponse.blockQuarantine: Block, quarantine, or encrypt sensitive data
preventionResponse.egress: Email, USB, and network egress controls

whyChooseUs.title: Why Choose Our Desktop Fleet Solutions
whyChooseUs.subtitle: Comprehensive fleet management with security-first approach and proven expertise.

securityFocused.title: Security Focused
securityFocused.description: Every solution prioritizes security with defense-in-depth strategies and real-time threat monitoring.

unifiedManagement.title: Unified Management
unifiedManagement.description: Single pane of glass for managing Windows and Linux fleets with consistent policies.

proactiveMonitoring.title: Proactive Monitoring
proactiveMonitoring.description: Real-time visibility and automated responses to issues before they impact users.

cta.title: Secure and Manage Your Desktop Fleet
cta.description: From RMM and policy enforcement to security monitoring and SOC setup, we provide complete desktop fleet management solutions.

netterDSQL.title: Netter DSQL
netterDSQL.subtitle: Unify multiple database workloads in a single platform with ACID transactions, fault tolerance, and limitless scalability for OLTP, OLAP, and streaming.

targetAudience.title: Built for Modern Organizations
targetAudience.subtitle: Netter DSQL is designed to serve the diverse needs of cloud providers and businesses of any size, from startups to enterprise organizations.

cloudProviders.title: Cloud Providers
cloudProviders.description: Offer your customers a unified database-as-a-service platform that handles OLTP, OLAP, and streaming workloads with enterprise-grade reliability and infinite scalability.

anySizeBusiness.title: Any Size Business
anySizeBusiness.description: From lean startups needing rapid scaling to large enterprises requiring mission-critical reliability, Netter DSQL adapts to your business requirements and growth trajectory.

aiPowered.title: AI-Powered Intelligence
aiPowered.description: Native vector similarity search and LLM-ready SQL queries enable semantic search and intelligent recommendations with enterprise-grade performance.

acidTransactions.title: Global ACID Transactions
acidTransactions.description: Ensure data consistency across distributed systems with strong ACID guarantees, online scalability, and real-time change data capture.

analytics.title: Massively Parallel Analytics
analytics.description: Columnar storage with vectorized MPP query engine delivers top-tier performance for analytical workloads with federated query support.

oltpOlap.title: Unified OLTP & OLAP Engine
oltpOlap.description: Single platform handling both Online Transaction Processing (OLTP) for real-time operations and Online Analytical Processing (OLAP) for complex business intelligence queries.

eventQueue.title: Event Queue & Stream Processing
eventQueue.description: Netter DSQL serves as both a database and a persistent, distributed event queue system. Unlike traditional Kafka deployments, our events are stored with full database durability and consistency guarantees.

persistent.title: Persistent & Distributed
persistent.description: Events are stored persistently across multiple nodes with automatic replication and fault tolerance, ensuring zero data loss.

databaseNative.title: Database-Native Streaming
databaseNative.description: Stream processing capabilities are built into the database engine, eliminating the need for separate streaming infrastructure.

kafkaCompatibility.title: Kafka API Compatibility
kafkaCompatibility.description: Full Kafka 3.4.0 API compatibility means your existing applications work without modification.

streaming.title: Real-time Streaming
streaming.description: Kafka API 3.4.0 compatibility with exactly-once delivery and seamless topic-table transactional integration for modern streaming applications.

openSource.title: Open Source
openSource.description: Apache 2.0 licensed, deploy anywhere with full community support.

enterprise.title: Enterprise Edition
enterprise.description: Enhanced security, support, and enterprise-grade features.

cloudManaged.title: Cloud Managed
cloudManaged.description: Fully managed service with 99.99% availability guarantee.
